document_data.name: ''Machinations of a Red Wizard''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Machinations of a Red Wizard''''' was a book written by [[Celemir]] of [[Procampur]]. It was about the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].<ref group="note">Given the nature of the collection, this book may also have topics related to warcraft and battle strategy.

[[Cedric Ravajar]] owned a copy at the [[Vipers' Nest]] in [[the Vast]] in [[1369 DR]]. This was worth 75 [[gp]].{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|66}}
